PrecisApproval of the re-appointment by the Minister of Public Works and Government Services of HÉLÈNE LORRAIN-TARDIF, of Sainte-Julie, Quebec, as a director of the Board of Directors of the Canada Post Corporation to hold office during pleasure for a term of two years.
